Runtastic is an innovative suite of apps, products and services that track and manage health and fitness data to motivate individuals to get in shape, stay healthy and improve overall fitness.

Auto Pause: No more pausing and resuming a session if you have to tie your shoe, stretch or get a red light - clock is stopped automatically with the Auto Pause feature.
Auto Pause is not available for this Sport Type
Auto Pause is not available for %s activities
Speed & Cadence Sensor: Use the app with Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor hardware.
Get a lot of extra features with
Geo Tagging: Take images during your sports sessions. Save your memories and share it with others.
Heart Rate Measurement: Monitor your pulse during your activity and get detailed statistics afterwards.
Heart Rate Zones: Strengthen your cardiovascular system, burn fat and optimize training with workouts in the correct heart rate zone.
Interval training and coaching: Improve your performance by gradually increasing your training.
LIVE Tracking and Cheering: Share your performance live to family and friends. Get cheered on and be motivated to go further.
No Ads: Enjoy Runtastic without any ads.
Powersong: Choose your powersong and play it if you need that extra boost during an activity!
Colored Traces: Different colors on the map indicate changes such as pace, elevation, heart rate, grade etc. Have a look at steep climbs and very fast intervals directly on the map.
Runtastic Earth View: Experience your sessions now in 3D, including mountains, architectural sights and buildings. Runtastic Earth View makes your sessions unforgettable experiences.
Grade and Rate of Climb: See how steep or how fast you ride up a mountain.
Offline Maps: Download maps for later use without internet connection.
Routes: Map and plan out the distance and elevation for your next fitness activity on www.runtastic.com using Google Maps. Sync the route to your phone, preview the route in Google Earth and go!
Split table: Compare your lap splits with a dynamic split table.
Voice Coach: Get voice feedback about your performance every minute or kilometer/mile (configurable).
Weather information: Get current weather information which is saved automatically for your activities.
Workouts with goals: Find your calories burned or set a pace goal.
Feeling good? Remember you can add your mood to your activity, if you like!

If you want to increase your cardiovascular capacity and your pace, the aerobic zone is right for you. Here you will improve your muscle strength and continue to burn stored body fat.

If increasing your anaerobic threshold (AT) is what you want, use the anaerobic zone. Training in this zone will delay the point (AT) where your body cannot remove lactic acid from the working muscles quickly enough.
If you are a beginner or have not exercised in a while, use the easy zone. This zone will increase your fitness levels and burn fat as well.
If your aim is endurance training, use the fat burning zone. This zone will help improve the supply of energy to the working muscles. Your heart will benefit and stored body fat will be burned.
Do not train in the red line zone, unless you are a serious athlete. Here you can increase your pace and develop speed, but be careful! You should only train in this zone for short intervals.

A connection to your Bluetooth Heart Rate Monitor could not be established. Please try to follow these hints:
  • Switch your phones Bluetooth off an on
  • Check the battery of the transmitter on the belt
    • %s
  • Make sure the strap sits firmly below your chest muscle
  • Moisten the contacts on the strap or use ECG gel
• Re-pair the HR monitor in the phone settings

Alternate between fat burning and aerobic zones. Ten min. warm-up jog, followed by 5 intervals: 1 min. fat burning + 1 min. aerobic zone. Finish with a 5 min. cool down jog or walk. Total time: 25 min.
Alternate between fat burning and anaerobic zones. Ten min. run to start, followed by 10 intervals: 1 min fat burning + 1 min anaerobic zone. Finish with a 10 min. cool down. Total time: 40 min.
Alternate between beginner and anaerobic zones. Run 1 km easy, followed by 5 intervals: 1 km anaerobic zone + 400 m beginner zone. Finish with a 1 km cool down.
Alternate between beginner and anaerobic zones. Run 1 km easy, followed by 10 intervals: 400 m anaerobic zone + 200 m beginner zone. Finish with a 1 km cool down.

Receive a variety of helpful & motivational tips from 7 unique categories, including: Lifestyle, Weight Loss and Nutrition. Live better, stay motivated & reach your goals!
Get Premium and set customized goals for all values tracked within your Me app! Set goals for: Steps, Active Minutes, Burned Calories & More.
As you take your daily tracking long term, enjoy the benefit of reviewing personal stats month-by-month and year-to-year. Celebrate progress & identify potential!
Gain access to your daily detailed stats for more than just the past week with Runtastic Premium... Especially useful for identifying your habits & long-term lifestyle improvements.
As a Premium Member, you can filter through and compare your historical stats with various parameters, keeping your tracking dynamic & interesting.
Premium Members enjoy access to hundreds of bodyweight exercise videos. Learn how to execute new moves properly & never get bored with this wide variety of content!
Hello, healthy! Use our 12-week Health & Nutrition Guide to complement your workouts and maximize your weight loss, fat loss, muscle gain & overall body transformation.
Not ready for a plan, but ready to mix up your fitness routine? Upgrade & gain full access to dozens of challenging predefined workouts. Guaranteed to keep you and your muscles engaged!
Benefit from a personalized, dynamic, 12-week bodyweight training plan that can be executed (in 15-30 minutes!) anytime, anywhere - no equipment required.
"Auto Pause (one of our most beloved features!), advanced statistics and additional history filters are just a few of the additional features you'll enjoy when you upgrade."

"We've teamed up with Runner's World to keep you up to speed & inspired. Go Premium and get a free, three-month subscription of incredible content - choose between Runner's World and Bicycling magazine! What are you waiting for?"
No more purchasing one Story Run after another! Enjoy a variety of genres, including: Adventure, Weight Loss, Fantasy & Motivation - unlimited & free with your Premium Membership.
"Great news! Unlimited, FREE Runtastic Training Plans are now available within your Runtastic app. Whatever your goal, we've got a plan for that - so hop to it!"
As a Premium Member, ads within your Runtastic app are a thing of the past. Enjoy a streamlined, ad-free mobile experience with your Premium Membership!
Tons of performance-focused features are waiting to help you reach goals. Runtastic Routes, colored traces, interval trainings and workout goals are available to you when you upgrade today.
Motivation is guaranteed with the Voice Coach and Powersong features. Customize coaching options to suit your preferences & select your top mood-boosting song to add an extra kick to your workout!
"You're a numbers person? As a Premium Member, you'll receive detailed data analysis that provides context for your activity stats, helps you monitor progress & reach personal goals!"
"Enjoy unlimited Runtastic Training Plans for goals of all kinds! Whether you're looking to lose weight or train for your first 10k, find and try a variety of plans with Premium."
... including Colored Traces, Runtastic Routes and numerous weight management tools. Go Premium and gain unlimited access to all great features & benefits today!
Ready for the best of the best? With your Premium Membership, enjoy an ad-free Runtastic.com experience & top-of-the-line support from our Community Management team.
The holy grail of motivation: Send personal encouragement within the Runtastic community (for those days when friends need an extra push) via LIVE Tracking & Cheering!
Track and beat a wide variety of personal records! Why bother? Because challenging yourself to give your all is a fun way to keep your fitness routine fresh & satisfying.

"You're moving quite fast! Maybe you've selected the wrong sport"

A key, a moment of carelessness, a glimmer of hope. Maybe his only hope. Was it coincidence or destiny? His steps are echoing in the tunnel, suddenly, the noise of dogs barking. Are they at his heels already?

"The hunt continues. You did it! You escaped from Alcatraz & you got the disk - but they're hot on your tail! And they got Steven, who never stopped believing in you & was relentlessly searching for answers. Your feet are flying over the asphalt. Will you get there in time? And, is it possible that Stephanie plays a role in this whole mystery?"
"Impressive! You managed to lose them! You're safe, for now..."

"The walls of Alcatraz couldn't stop you, and the flight continues! Will the information you fought so hard to get help you unveil the truth about Horizon Tracks Enterprises and Stephanie? Give it your all one more time and leave the past behind once and for all!"
"You did it! You gave your best & shook off your pursuers!"

Want to mix up your running routine? Try guided interval training, give your best and push your limits! Combining slower and faster intervals improves your fitness and helps you take running to the next level. Lace up, head out, get inspired & see results!
"Way to go! You just knocked out an interval run!"

"Bored by running for running's sake? Put your muscles to the test with Running for Results! The varied exercises of this fartlek challenge your entire body. Take your running to the next level with holistic training, keep your motivation high & boost your performance!"
"Respect! You just mastered a challenging fartlek!"

All hopes of the Iomluath are pinned onto her. She has to keep on running, she just has to find the cure and bring it back to her people. Branches snap under her feet as she runs, anxiety hangs in the air... is it already too late?
Tell your friends about your good deed.
"Congratulations You did it! You saved the Iomluath!"

"Today's the day. People all over the world are gathering for an incredible global running event. And it isn't just any old fun run! You're at the start of the Wings for Life World Run. You're running so that one day spinal cord paralysis will be curable. You're running for those who can't!"
Support Wings for Life on their mission to make spinal cord paralysis curable and share their vision!
"FUNtastic! You've just run for those who can't!"

"Have a goal, but lack determination? Feel motivated, but then give up easily when things get tough? It doesn't have to be that way. Get started and learn more about the power of thought, goal setting, motivation and perseverance!"
Pass your new motivation on to your friends!
"Congratulations You are now one step closer to your goal!"

"All you can think about is weight loss? You want to finally reach your desired weight? Learn more about goal setting and motivation strategies while approaching your ideal weight, step by step. Don't forget: Simply keep moving!"
"Congratulations! Your journey to your ideal weight has started!"
Your Journey to Weight Loss I

Is your goal is to get fit and live a healthier lifestyle? Are you looking to lose a few pounds? Then, this Story Run is just right for you! Learn more about all things weight loss and let these concrete steps guide you towards your goal.
"Great! You're on the right path towards your ideal weight!"
Your Journey to Weight Loss II

"Wolves at your back and fire all around. Stopping would mean certain death. There's just one way out! Follow the mysterious instructions of the Eagle, while running for your life before the eyes of bloodthirsty spectators. For your life and the salvation of your people... Can you make it? Are you up to the task?"
"Woohoo! You made it! You found your way out of the Tetradome!"
Are you fast enough to survive?

"\"Starting now, your name is Spartacus.\" You're still running, but now under free skies, through the city of New Rome. The mysterious voice from the headset is guiding you while thousands of slaves follow your lead. But, whom can you trust? Are they still chasing you?"
"Awesome! You just gave everything chasing through New Rome!"

"You're back in the Tetradome! Once again, wolves are chasing you. This time, the path leads into thick, heavy fog. You've been fooled and you're running for your life... Will you be able to escape yet again? Make one last effort and give it your all! Make a dash for freedom!"
"YES!!! You survived the Tetradome! You're free now!"

"You're running right next to your sister, trying to escape bounty hunters and crazy Cranks - they're all after you, because you're immune to the Flare. Your feet are flying over the hot sands of the Scorch, then through pitch-black tunnels. Will you reach the city center before them?"
"Yes!!! You just shook off your pursuers in the Scorch!"
In cooperation with Twentieth Century Fox
All story runs free for Premium members
"It's your turn to dive into this one-of-a-kind interval training experience & get fully immersed in your run with Story Running. You're not just listening to the story - you're in it!"

"One week ago, work was his life. The decision to trade a workaholic lifestyle for running shoes, a suitcase and a plane ticket was a tough one. But now he's really and truly jogging through Rio de Janeiro! Where else will his journey take him?"
"Felicitações! You just discovered Rio de Janeiro!"

Walking down memory lane while enjoying multifaceted Austria - these are moments of bliss. Through the city center of Vienna to a beautiful lake in Carinthia, followed by an impressive valley in Tyrol: Head out for a relaxed run surrounded by nature, far from the hustle & bustle of everyday life.
Amazing! You did great on your run across Austria!

"Discover the Big Apple on the run! In \"The City is our Gym\" you'll run through the streets of New York City, accompanied by the Bridgerunners, a group of fellow runners of all training levels who regularly head out to enjoy the beauty of the city while pounding the pavement!"
Wow! You just ran across New York City!
A Runtastic Story Run about New York City
Get a Premium Membership and all Story Runs for free!
